code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Register.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Register=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[name,setName]=useState('');const[surname,setSurname]=useState('');const[age,setAge]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleRegister=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await
